snippet.title: 2D Paintball - Hype - Speedball Trailer
snippet.description:
Showcasing the intensity, style, and feel of high-speed competitive paintball.

Play online for free @ www.2DPaintball.com!

Game Theory - The idea is to create a real-time multiplayer 2D simulated speedball experience, by trying to re-create the true feel, strategy, and gameplay of playing tournament speedball. We believe that getting all of the "small" details right is what can really make this game work even in a 2D environment.

So in turn, this game will be less about graphics and more about actually getting the "feels" of high-caliber paintball in 2D!
